Texts.Chs: 一个漂亮的标准飞船人工智能控制台，真的。 没什么特别的。 这东西不太可能好吃。
Texts.Eng: A pretty standard ship AI console, really. Nothing special. It is not likely to be tasty.

Texts.Chs: 这是人工智能控制台吗？我真的不知道。上面有闪闪发光的东西和各种各样的数学知识。
Texts.Eng: This an AI console?  I really don't know. It has glowy bits and all sorts of math on it.

Texts.Chs: 这是人工智能控制台吗？我以为他们在尼科斯角灾难之后就被禁止了...嗯，现在这是我最好的机会了！
Texts.Eng: This an AI console?  I thought they were banned after the Nikos Point disaster... well, it's my best shot now!
